<@ for ver in version.list @> <@ if loop.first @> {% if page.versionHref == "<$ ver.href $>" %} <@ else @> {% elsif page.versionHref == "<$ ver.href $>" %} <@ endif @> {% include v2_fluid/api_menu_flat_<$ ver.name $>.html %} <@ endfor @> <# make the last case always be to show latest version #> {% else %} {% include v2_fluid/api_menu_flat_nightly.html %} {% endif %}
